availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew J. Morgan (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Eulett Morgan in Lewis County on October 8, 1846. Father of John T. Morgan, Daniel B. Morgan, Mary J. Morgan, Andrew J. Morgan, William H. M. Morgan, James J. Morgan, Matilda E. Morgan, Isaac Morgan, Sarah Morgan, and Nancy Morgan. Farmer in Lewis County in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860. Farmer in Lewis County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 235A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 942-3.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Audrain County, Salt River Township, p. 603B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Lewis County, KY, October 1863, p. 74.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film 000344051.
